bug.short_desc: No commits are resolved if a project is also available from a wrapper project as a linked resource

long_desc.thetext:
The proposed solution is to pass an IProject upon creation of GitRepository instances, The instance will keep a reference to the resource and a getter will be provided so e.g. the GitConnector can requested the associated Work Space project in order to determine which project to select from multiple ones linking to the same repository file.
This solution will make sure to resolve a selected project from multiple ones available in the work space and pointing to the same repository resource, e.g. root cause for Bug 381036, while importing projects using m2e-egit
The implementation has now been pushed to the master branch as described in comment 1
